name: Concealing Fog
description: A thick fog appears in a circular area of radius 4 hexes targeted by the caster.  Creatures within the fog gain a +10 concealment bonus per hex of fog a hostile must look through to see them.  The fog remains in place for between 5 and 10 rounds.

upgrades.description: When upgraded with Distracting Fog, creatures in the fog suffer a 10 point penalty to Mental Resistance, and a 10 point plus one per caster level penalty to Attack and to Spell Failure.
With Poison Fog, creatures in the fog now suffer a penalty to Strength and Constitution.  The penalty starts at -1, and increases by 1 point for each round the creature remains in the fog.
